questions.quote: I can't, I don't have it, I don't have a square to spare, I can't spare a square
Nothing. And neither will you. George can never know about this.. It'll crush him.

So he walks out of the stall, he's been talking the whole time.
I did. I'm back. I love this relationship, I feel so liberated!
